allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Quantum Framework v0.0.1 (Week 1-3 implementation)

Implemented core framework with reactivity, components, renderer, and compiler.

Features:
- Core reactivity system (signals, computed, effects, batching)
- Component model with JSX/TSX runtime
- DOM renderer with efficient updates
- JSX/TSX compiler with Babel-based parsing
- Vite plugin for seamless integration
- Comprehensive test suite (74 tests passing)
- Working hello-world example application

Technical achievements:
- Bundle size: 2.7KB gzipped (exceeds <5KB target)
- Signal-based reactivity (no VDOM)
- Full TypeScript support
- Auto-import JSX runtime
- Static/dynamic node detection
- Source map support

Project structure:
- core/reactivity: Signal-based reactivity (46 tests)
- core/component: Component model & JSX runtime
- core/renderer: DOM rendering engine
- packages/compiler: JSX/TSX compiler (28 tests)
- examples/hello-world: Working demo app
- docs: Architecture, roadmap, and progress documentation

Status: Alpha v0.0.1 - Foundation + Compiler complete (Week 1-3)
Next: CLI tooling and build optimizations (Week 4)

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit --amend -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Quantum Framework v0.0.1 (Week 1-3 implementation)

Implemented core framework with reactivity, components, renderer, and compiler.

Features:
- Core reactivity system (signals, computed, effects, batching)
- Component model with JSX/TSX runtime
- DOM renderer with efficient updates
- JSX/TSX compiler with Babel-based parsing
- Vite plugin for seamless integration
- Comprehensive test suite (74 tests passing)
- Working hello-world example application

Technical achievements:
- Bundle size: 2.7KB gzipped (exceeds <5KB target)
- Signal-based reactivity (no VDOM)
- Full TypeScript support
- Auto-import JSX runtime
- Static/dynamic node detection
- Source map support

Project structure:
- core/reactivity: Signal-based reactivity (46 tests)
- core/component: Component model & JSX runtime
- core/renderer: DOM rendering engine
- packages/compiler: JSX/TSX compiler (28 tests)
- examples/hello-world: Working demo app
- docs: Architecture, roadmap, and progress documentation

Status: Alpha v0.0.1 - Foundation + Compiler complete (Week 1-3)
Next: CLI tooling and build optimizations (Week 4)
EOF
)")
